channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiWLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiWLM

item.title: CVE-2023-34991|2024-10-22T20:51:57.761Z -- fortinet -- fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 and 8.5.0 through 8.5.4 and 8.4.0 through 8.4.2 and 8.3.0 through 8.3.2 and 8.2.2 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via a crafted http request.
